Name: Fragment of a relief with a bowing servant
Description: A fragment of a relief with representation in sunk relief, showing a servant bent in obeisance facing left. He is bald-headed and wears a long kilt. His left arm is bent, his right arm is stretched out in front of him. In front of him is a low basin, behind him a storage jar.  Above the servant and the jar runs a horizontal line. Both style and subject of the representation are typical for the Amarna Period.
